item.title: Download
item.description: The current stable version of Dunst is 1.8.0 released on Feb 24 2022. Downloads Source tarball Code repository (Github) Release Notes For v1.8.0 Lots of exciting and useful features are being added to dunst, all while making dunst even more configurable and reliable. For users: This release re-adds the keyboard shortcuts for those who have been missing them. Also, support for drop-in files has been implemented. Files placed in dunstrc.

item.title: Documentation
item.description: dunst - configuration file NAME DESCRIPTION Global section Keyboard shortcuts (X11 only) Urgency sections DUNSTCTL HISTORY WAYLAND RULES SCRIPTING COLORS NOTIFY-SEND ACTIONS TIME FORMAT AUTHORS REPORTING BUGS COPYRIGHT SEE ALSO NAME dunst - configuration file DESCRIPTION The configuration is divided into sections in an ini-like format. Every section start with the section's name in square brackets. After that is a list of key-value pairs that specify the settings.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Common problems Errors about missing or failing to open a display Depending on the setup dunst was unable to connect to the X server or the wayland compositor in use. In case of X make sure that X is running and that the DISPLAY environment variable is correctly set. For a wayland based setup the WAYLAND_DISPLAY environment variable needs to be set to a valid value. If dunst should be automatically started by dbus or via the systemd service, it is important to know that both don’t inherit environment variables set by a shell.

Dunst changelog 1.8.0 – 2022-02-24 Added Implemented progress_bar_min_width. Before it was an unused setting. (#1006) progress_bar_horizontal_alignment for changing the alignment of the progress bar. (#1021) Support for config drop-ins. You can add as many configuration files as you want in dunstrc.d. See the man page dunst(1) for more information. This was done with help from @WhitePeter. (#997) Thanks to @m-barlett you can place your icons at the center of your notifications with icon_position = top.
